title: Naanagiya Nadhimoolame Lyrics Vishwaroopam 2
stanzas:
dhaga thita
dhaga thituku
dhana thathak thakku
dhigina dhana
dhigita dhaga
thitiku dhana
dhinak dhana
thakita than
thalana girikita
tharikitta girikita
tharikita girikita
tharikita dha dha dha
thalana kita thaka
tharikita dha ...

naanaagiya nathimoolame
thaayaagiya aathaarame
enai thaangiya karukudam
inaiye illa thiruthalam

unpola naa uyiraanathum
pen endra naan
thaayaanathum

pirantha payanaai
unai perum..
sirantha perumai
nigazhnthathum.

dhaga thita
thaga thikina thana
thathaka thaka
dikita dhan thithikita
dhaga thitiku
dhana thinaku dhana
thakita thana
thalan nikitathaka
tharikita kita thaka
tharikita kita thaka
tharikita kata dhadha
gina dhathidha 

ammavum nee
appaavum nee
anbaal enai 
aandaalum nee

 pirantha payanaai 
unai perum..
sirantha perumai
nigazhnthathum.

unmanathin saayalulla
penuruvai thaedinen
pazhanganavai kaanalile
kankalanga kangiren

pazhaiyapadi ninaivugal
thirumbidum
pirandha madi
saaindhida kidaithidum
naal varumo....
thirunaal varumo

pa ni sa
ga ga ri
sa ni
ni pa ma ga
pa ni sa
ga ri
pa sa ni
sa ni

naanaagiya nathimoolame
thaayaagiya aathaarame
enai thaangiya karukudam
inaiye illa thiruthalam
